114312.content:
Yang had been having some trouble sleeping with upcoming exams at Beacon, and the stresses of constantly having to fight off the various nut-jobs who often threatened both her and her friends. She was getting annoyed with it, and so were her friends. In fact, Yang had been nodding off during training, in class, and at lunch.

The group all tossed around ideas for what Yang could do. Sleeping pills, yoga, so many options which either didn't work, or Yang didn't want to do. Eventually Blake made a suggestion... of Hypnosis. Yang was obviously skeptical, and was concerned it wouldn't work if others were around.

Her friends decided to take a night out, staying at a hotel rather than in their room so that Yang had the tranquility she needed to give hypnosis a shot.

She sat down early in the evening after her friends had cleared out, dressed in her pajamas and ready to wind down. She scrolled through a few pages of videos, trying to find one that caught her attention. None seemed more or less reliable than others by the title or thumbnail so eventually she just made a decision and clicked.

The video began and a black and white spiral appeared on the screen, as well as some white noise that wasn't annoying, but was definitely noticeable. Yang sat and watched the spiral for a while, not really thinking it was working. But she found herself unable to pull her eyes from the screen. Unable to stop watching.

The video continued for about 15 minutes, but to Yang it felt only like a few seconds. Eventually her eyes drifted shut and she slumped down into the chair.

The video counted down to it's final minute and the white noise cleared. A relaxed, velvety, male voice came out over the speaker.

"If you can hear me, and you are in a trance right now, please open your eyes and look back at the screen but remain in this trance."

Yang's eyes slowly opened, revealing their glazed over, blankened state. She looked back at the screen.

"Good. Now, when this video ends you will go to my channel and select any other video I have. You will not select this one again, nor will you select any you have already watched in the future. When that video begins you will hear my voice again and you will follow my commands." the voice said. As the words stopped, so did the video.

Yang's hand moved to the mouse. She clicked around on the owner of the video's profile, scanning and clicking with the tenacity and focus of a robot. Her mind not really doing any real reasoning when she picked her next video. Whichever it was that would give her commands.

Eventually, however, the hypnotized blonde settled on one video with the title of...

According to the first page, anything he wrote in the following pages would become the reality of his partner, the lovely and talented, Pyrrha Nikos. "This has to be fake." He muttered for probably the hundredth time since finding the book. He'd brought a pen from his dorm room, which he picked up, opened the book to the first blank page, and wrote Pyrrha must go to Jaune.

Meanwhile, Pyrrha lay on her bed, a sad look on her face. "How do I tell Jaune that I love him?" She quietly asked herself. "I just-" At the moment, the power of the book took over, as her eyes turned white, and her face became an emotionless mask. "I must go to Jaune..." She said, her voice now a robotic monotone. She stood up perfectly straight, turned, and walked in a slow, stiff, and robotic manner. Upon reaching the door, she opened it as if she were a robot, and marched out of the room, and to the roof. 1151333212222111.content:
Jaune sat for a few minutes, listening for his partner. He scoffed. "Did you really expect it to work?" He asked himself. "Did you REALLY expect a book to give you control of Pyrrha?!" He was getting angry, at himself or the book even he didn't know. "Did you-" He stopped when he heard a familiar voice. "That couldn't have been Pyrrha?" Jaune asked himself "Could it?"

The answer came when the roof access door was opened by Pyrrha, who was blank and emotionless, thanks to the book. "I must go to Jaune..." She said, her voice a robotic monotone, as she stiffly made her robotic way to the blonde boy. "I am here, Jaune..." She said, her voice unchanged.

Jaune stared at his partner, then the book, then back at Pyrrha. "It worked!" Was all he could muster. Now, he had a choice: Continue controlling Pyrrha, or letting her wake up.
1151333212222111.title: She gets to the roof without problems.

As for Cardin..... why whatever, he's a choice. Or perhaps go with someone else?
115133321222212.title: Someone else has it.

choices: Change her to be more to his liking?
1151333212222122.content:
Cardin sat in his dorm room and looked at the book in his hands. According to the first page, anything he wrote in the pages would be come the reality of one Pyrrha Nikos. 'This has to be fake.' He thought to himself, and yet...

He picked up a pen and began writing. He decided to go with something simple to test the book. Pyrrha decided to go to her Master. One floor down, Pyrrha was approaching the door to her dorm room, when the book's power seized control of her. She stood perfectly straight, her eyes white, and her face devoid of emotion. She turned, and began slowly walking away, her movements stiff, her arms and legs straight like a robot. "I must go to my Master... I must go to my Master..." She began mindlessly repeating, her voice a robotic sounding monotone. She marched to Team CRDL's dorm, she walked into the door, rebounded off it, and began repeating this, all the while repeating "I must go to my Master..."

Hearing the noise, Cardin opened the door, and was stunned when Pyrrha marched mindlessly and robotically into his dorm. "I am here, Master...." She said to him. "It worked!" He spluttered. His mind raced as he tried to figure out what to do next.
1151333212222122.title: Cardin Winchester

11533311121.content:
It was a normal day for team RWBY. "Hey Weiss there a package from your aunt?" Yang said handing it to her. Weiss read the letter and reminded that her aunt keeped all her toys when she was a baby. Excited she opened up the package and pulled out her old nanny doll. "It's Miss Nanu!" Weiss squealing. Yang laughed only to get a hit from Black. "Weiss? What or um who is Miss Nanu?" Black asked making Weiss turn around and holding up the nanny doll. "She my very first doll I got from my aunt when I turned 1 I thought I losted her years ago." Weiss said as she hugged the doll. Even Black smiled at Weiss but Yang and Ruby giggled at the way Weiss was acting. Come on girls you never had something you loved from your childhood?" Black said the two stopped after remembering there dolls. The day went on as the girls noticed Weiss's clothes changed.

"Um Weiss what's up with your clothes?" Ruby asked seeing her teammate dressed like a toddler. "Oh well nanny wanting me to dress differently and this was the only other clothes I had." Weiss said making Ruby take a step back. "Um sure whatever you say." Ruby said as she headed to her bed. The girls where either playing on there scrolls or reading besides Weiss. Weiss was drawing on a piece of paper. More so drawing her and Nanu as a human and her around the age of a toddler. An hour passed away when Black saw Weiss passed out on her desk where she picked up Weiss and with help from Ruby where able to get Weiss into her bed.
Black on the other hand was about to give Weiss Nanu but something stopped her when she looked into the dolls eyes. Black then started to hear a voice in her head telling her to keep her. Black obeyed the doll and went to her bed holding the doll. As the team was sleeping Nanu's eye began to glow as both Black's and Weiss eye did as well. "Now my sweet baby girls I want you to wake up and empty both your bladder and blowers and cry into your teammates change you." Nanu said the girls giggled and nodded as there eyes turned back to normal. "I'll just have to get the other two and then I'll be free from this doll." Nanu said waiting for the morning to come.
11533311121.title: RWBY and the adventure of the curse nanny doll

1153331221.content: How about transforming them into fembots?
1153331221.title: Transformations it is.

choices: They acted like their normal human selves, with no memory of ehat happened.
They acted like robots, their movement stiff and jerky.
11533312211.content:
Pyrrha Nikos brought a pair of packages into her team's dorm room. Her sponsors had sent her some stuff to test. She found her friend and fellow redhead, Nora Valkyrie, lying on her bed. "Whatcha got there." She asked. "Something from my sponsors." The champion replied.

Opening the smaller box, she found two full water bottles. "Good time! I'm parched!" The bubbly hammer wielder said, grabbing one of the bottles and chugging the contents before her friend could stop her. Sighing, Pyrrha took the other bottle, and drank it dry. "I must've been thirstier than I thought." She muttered.

The second, larger package contained a number of metal rings. "Why did they send you metal hula hoops?" Nora ask, picking one up. "I haven't the faintest idea." Pyrrha said.

Suddenly, the rings all beeped, then floated into the air, settling around the two shocked girls. Before either could fight back, the rings began blasting them with a strange energy. This energy activated the nanomachines in the fluid they'd both consumed, which began changing them from the inside out!

Both of the redheads felt sick to their stomachs and light headed, before the stood to attemtion, closing their eyes. In a matter of seconds, both were transformed. Their muscles and bones became servos and metal, their nerves became fiber optic cables, and their brains a collection of circuitry. Their skin became a plastic-silicone mixture that felt life-like. The final change, was a small antenna sticking out of the top right of their heads. Both huntresses-in-training had been transformed, into fembots.

They soon received a signal, which activated them.
11533312211.title: Fembotize them!

115333122111.content:
The two open their eyes, blink a few times, and then begin talking about their studies, their home lives, and the oblivious boys they loved. They neither remember what happened to them, nor noticed the changes to their bodies. Neither did Jaune and Ren, when they returned to the dorm room.

A few hours later, after lights out, the four lay in bed, the two boys sleeping, the fembots in sleep mode. Suddenly, both opened their eyes and sat up. Their faces were blank, devoid of emotion, as they got out of bed, and walked out the door. They walked with mechanical efficiency down the halls, to a destination programmed into them by a unknown party.

Soon, the reached a janitor's closet, and entered it, closing the door behind them. As soon as the door closed, the floor began lowering at a speed the girls would've found alarming, had they any humanity left.

The lift stopped suddenly, and both fembotized girls marched off, into a laboratory. They made their way to a computer, whose screen lit up with the face of an elderly man with messy gray hair and beard with one mechanical eye. They instantly recognized him as their Master: Dr. Merlot.

"State your designations." He commanded. "Fembot Designation: Pyrrha Nikos." The redheaded champion said, her voice a dead monotone. "Fembot Designation: Nora Valkyrie." The once bubbly girl said, her voice just as dead.

"Excellent! You two will be my agents inside Beacon. You will also be my hands, terminating my enemies with extreme prejudice!" "Yes, Master." Both said.
115333122111.title: They acted like their normal human selves, with...

choices: Rechagre them and send them on their way.
Have them run diagnostics checks on their systems.
1153331221111.content: A pair of helmets on metal poles descended until they were resting an inch above the heads of the two fembots. "Prepare to receive your programming." Dr. Merlot ordered. "Yes, Master. Ready for programming." "You will search for locations to plant explosives." Both fembots shuddered as electricity flowed into them, though their faces remained blank, as the programming took hold. "If you are discovered, you will either injure to the point of the interloper not being able to remember seeing you, or terminate them." The shuddered again, more programming put in their fembot minds. "Yes, Master." Both fembots said, their voices still dead monotones.
1153331221111.title: Program them for their mission.
